p: Palm oil is an extremely valuable commercial crop in tropical countries. Palm oil, which is extracted from oil palm, is often used as raw materials for the production of biofuel, biofertilizers, oleochemicals, biomass products, nutraceuticals and pharmaceuticals. In fact, tropical countries are among the global leaders in the palm oil industry [ 234]. The implementation of optics and photonic techniques in palm oil-related activities will maintain the competitive power of the tropical countries in the field and help to reap the associated economic benefits.
